definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content icariin in the extract of Gushuling.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定骨疏靈提取物中淫羊藿苷的含量。

sentences.english: RESULTS 18 species small-flowered taxa of Epimedium L. were found in China.
sentences.chinese: 結果中國有淫羊藿小花類羣18種。

sentences.english: RESULTS The glycoside content of Epimedium was found the highest in leaves, the lowest in the stems.
sentences.chinese: 結果淫羊藿苷在葉片中含量最高，地上莖最低。

sentences.english: HPLC was used to determine the content of icariin.
sentences.chinese: 用高效液相外標法測定淫羊藿苷的含量。

sentences.english: The action of targeting drug-liposome was most significant.
sentences.chinese: 其中淫羊藿總黃酮的靶向製劑脂質體作用最強。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a determination method of icariin in Kangnao Shu oral solution.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立康腦舒口服液中淫羊藿苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective:To establish the HPLC method for determination of icariin in Gushen pills.
sentences.chinese: 目的採用HPLC法測定固腎丸中淫羊藿苷的含量。

sentences.english: The results show that the glycoside content of Epimedium is the highest in leaves, but the lowest in the stems.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，淫羊藿苷在葉片中含量最高，地上莖最低。

sentences.english: Aim Simultaneous determination of icariin and naringin in Gushukang granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的同時測定骨疏康顆粒中淫羊藿苷和柚皮苷的含量。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effects of Herba Epimedii extractive on myocardial ischemia in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究淫羊藿提取物對大鼠急性心肌缺血的影響。

sentences.english: Content Determination of Paeoniflorin in Lemai Soft Capsules by HPLC;
sentences.chinese: 目的建立補腦安神軟膠囊中淫羊藿苷含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The flavones and icariin contents of wild E.
sentences.chinese: 總黃酮和淫羊藿苷含量分析表明，野生E。

sentences.english: The results show that Icariin has strengthening effect on the isolated heart of toad.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明淫羊藿苷對蟾蜍離體心臟有強心作用。

definition: Anaphalis yedoensis (pearly everlasting reed)/used in Japanese names with phonetic value Ogi
to soar/to fly/to float/variant of 揚|扬[yang2], to scatter/to spread
red algae/Gracilaria, several species, some edible/Japanese ogonori/arch. used for vanilla-like herb
